name: Post by Weekday
author: Truong Thang @yensubldg

sections.description:
Post by day of the week is an easy way to manage posts.
It allows you to create a post for each day of the week.

How to use

  • Create a new post
  • Set the post date to a specific day of the week (if not set it will be all day)
  • Publish the post

What new in version 2.1.0

  • Added option for product
  • Don’t need create table in database
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from https://wordpress.org/plugins/post-by-day-of-the-week/
  2. Upload the plugin to the plugins directory
  3. Activate the plugin

Or

  1. Go to add new plugin
  2. Search for “Post by Weekday”
  3. See the “Post by Weekday” plugin
  4. Click “Install Now”
  5. Activate the plugin
